chunked_vad.lyrics_text: The sun goes down, the stars come out And all that counts is here and now My universe will never be the same I'm glad you came (Came, came, came)
And all that counts is here and now My universe will never be the same I'm glad you came (Came, came, came) You cast a spell on me, spell on me
My universe will never be the same I'm glad you came (Came, came, came) You cast a spell on me, spell on me You hit me like the sky fell on me, fell on me
I'm glad you came (Came, came, came) You cast a spell on me, spell on me You hit me like the sky fell on me, fell on me And I decided you look well on me, well on me
